matrix.check: Admin auth/session valid and admin role visible
Role management: admin can view users and update+rollback user role
Governance boundary: non-admin actors denied on admin endpoints
Marketplace moderation: archived listing hidden publicly and visible archived to owner
Community moderation: admin can view and delete community post
Operational admin: audit log filters and admin notifications visible
Role-request decisions reflected in user role and requester history
Governance boundary: non-admin denied admin audit logs
High-risk negatives: invalid role, missing IDs, malformed payloads rejected
